--- In gladiator@y..., insanerest@a... wrote:
> If we're comparing Soldiers to Thieves... keep in mind that Soldiers 
make 
> better teammates (generally speaking), since you have no real fear 
of a 
> Soldier blowing himself up. Otherwise, I'd agree, a Thief works 
better than a 
> Soldier.

The only way I'd keep a thief on my team is if I controlled the thief 
100% of the time.  Yes, thief has the liability issue.
